text:
The example <Realm> configuration for the JDBC realm has the following attribute:

connectionURL="jdbc:mysql://localhost/authority?user=dbuser&password=dbpass"

The ampersand '&' in this attribute causes the parser to fail.  It should
correctly read:

connectionURL="jdbc:mysql://localhost/authority?user=dbuser&password=dbpass"

A small error, but one likely to be frustrating to a new user copying and
pasting from the docs.
creator: kcbaltz@yahoo.com
glenn@apache.org
text:
thanks for reporting this.  I have commited a fix to the docs for both
Tomcat 4.1 and Tomcat 5.  It will be available in the next release.

Should I expect to see this fix reflected in the docs on the website
(jakarta.apache.org)?
